ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Thomas Zobel from the WWU Münster Imaging Network for the help with the analysis of the endosomal localization data. We are grateful to Sergio Grinstein, Hospital for Sick Children, Toronto, Canada, for help and advice on the endosomal pH measurements. A.K., C.E., S.L., V.G., and U.R. are members of the PHI Club of the Münster Alliance for Infection Research.

This work was supported by funding to U.R., C.E., and S.L. from the Interdisciplinary Center of Clinical Research of the Münster Medical School (IZKF, RE2/026/15, and Lud2/008/17) and the German Research Foundation (DFG; U.R.: SFB1009/A06, SFB1348/A11, GRK 1409, and S.L.: SFB1009/B02, GRK 1409, Lu477/23-1). The funders had no role in study design, data collection, and interpretation, or the decision to submit the work for publication.
